text: qal alsamry: ra'ayt ma lam yrwh - wahu jbryl ealayh alslam - ealaa frs, waqt khurujihim min albahr wghrq fireawn wjnwdh, fakhdht bkfy turabana min 'athar hafr frs jbryl, falqyth ealaa alhly aldhy sunieat minh alejl, fakan eijlana jsdana lah khwar; bala' wftnt, wkdhlk zyant li nafsi alammart bialsuw' hdha alsnye
